04:50, 29 July 20101,440 × 960 (765 KB)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Not only are the arms supposed to be 1/2th of the width of the flag, the arms needs to be in a 12x10 rectangle. Fixed to match emailed specifications and also reduced some code.
